lines.text: Oh Fred, quit living in the Stone Age!
Oh my, let me guess, you and Barney aren't speaking to each other again right?
Oh be quiet you big ape!
As long as you are always there, my love will never need repair! And so I bend on bended knee my dearest Pebbles, will you marry me?
Oh, Fred Flintstone! the only way you can change your mind, is with a brain transplant, oh but I don't think anyone could find another brain that small!
How, could I forget? I slipped on them so many times, that hospital emergency ward put in a revolving door!
Bamm-Bamm rubble!... if your going to dump me, at least have the decency to say it to my face
Milly was right!... you men are all neanderthals!
Well what's wrong with that?... er... Pebbles!
What's the matter Fred? got the wedding day blues?
Look, I don't need this, I'll got my career to think of!
